msg_choose_another_invitation: Attention! You are trying to send an invitation based on an invitation template that has no sufficient licenses available. Please choose another invitation template.

msg_help_course_invite_detail:
Send invitations

Presentation

On the Send Invitations page, you can preview the invitation templates and edit the list of recipients. Here you can choose which template you want to use for the generation of the invitations to be sent out to students in the list of recipients.

What to do

  1. Click on a template in the table of templates.
  2. The template's preview is shown in the field to the right of the template table.
  3. Make sure you selected the template you would like to send.
  4. Add the students to the list of recipients to whom you want to send an invitation. (There are two options for this, described in the explanations below.)
  5. Do not forget to tick the radio button of the area where the students were added (the selection activates the "Send" button).
  6. Click the "Send" button at the bottom of the page to send out the invitations.
  7. The system indicates that the invitations have been sent.
  8. You will be notified in an email message of the success of the sending out process.
  9. In order to have a look at the sent invitations, click on the menu item "Sent Invitations" on the left side.

Detailed explanation

Invitation templates table

Column Explanation
Organization The name of the organization that created the invitation
Invitation template Name of the invitation template (and also the subject of the invitation email)
Expiration The end of the period until the invitation can be accepted
Creator Name of the administrator that created the invitation
Sent The number of invitations sent out so far
License holder Name of the organisation that owns the license. (If the invitation template is not connected to a license, the value is "None".)
Available places The number of student places available with the license. (If the invitation template is not connected to a license, the value is "Unlimited.")
Used The number of student places already used up from the license. (If the invitation template is not connected to a license, the value is "-.")

Adding recipients to the list of recipients

You can add recipients to the list of recipients in two ways.

1. The "Add recipients" box provides you with the possibility to enter the students' email addresses one-by-one.

If you want to enter the e-mail addresses of only a few students, you can enter addresses manually or copy them from an external source. You could, for example, copy them from a list prepared in a text file into the text box here.

Attention! Always make sure that your email addresses are properly separated. There are two ways to do this: E-mail addresses must be separated by comma or enter. The following table lists the correct separation methods.

Separator Example
Comma abc@gmail.com,cba@gmail.com,xyz@gmail.com
Enter abc@gmail.com <enter>
cba@gmail.com <enter>
xyz@gmail.com

2. In the box "Add list of recepients" you also have the option to upload e-mail addresses in CSV formatte files containing many e-mail addresses.

This may be an obvious solution if the students' e-mail addresses, for example, are available in an Excel file. Save the student's email address from Excel in CSV format. Then click the "Upload file" button, select the CSV file in the popup window, and then click the "Open" button.
msg_help_course_invited_detail:
Sent Invitations

Presentation

On the Sent Invitations page you can view the status of your invitations sent in a tabular form. The table can be sorted by clicking on the columns' headers and filetered by the filters in the column header menu.

Explanation

Column Explanation
Invitation title The name of the invitation template the invitation was based on.
User name The student's name (if the student has not yet registered, the field is empty)
E-mail The student's email address to which the invitation was sent
Status The status of the invitation. Possible values are the following:
Active: the invitation has been sent and is waiting for an answer
Accepted: the invitation has been accepted by the student
Rejected: the invitation has been rejcted by the student
Expired: the invitation has expired
Forced: the student has been automatically enrolled in the course when registering or enrolling
Revoked: the invitation for this student was recalled
Duplicate: the student was already enrolled, and then received another invitation
Date of change of status Last change date of the invitation status
msg_help_course_list:
Course List

Presentation

On the course list page, you will see a table listing the courses you have access to as an administrator. You can choose here the course you want to invite students to.

What to do

  1. Select the row in the table containing the course you would like to invite students to.
  2. Click the "View" button at the end of the row.

Explanation of columns

The columns of the table contain the following information:

Column Name Explanation
Title Title of the course
Course provider Name of the institution providing the course
Enrollment period starts Start of the enrollment period for the course in question
Enrollment period ends The end of enrollment on the course in question
Result start Start of the period during which the students can achieve a result
Result end The end of the period during which students in the course can achieve results

The table shows the courses that are active, but can be set via the dropdown list "Course states" at the top of the table to display the courses that have already expired.

The table can be sorted by clicking on the column headers, and filtered by the filters in the column header.
msg_success_emailupload: The text you have entered has been successfully uploaded. The Nexius system started sending out the invitations. When the sending out has finished, we will notify you of its success and possible errors by sending you an e-mail message. Later, you can also click on the menu item "Sent Invitations" to get more information about the status of the sent invitations.
msg_success_fileupload: The file was successfully uploaded. The Nexius system started sending out the invitations. When the sending out has finished, we will notify you of its success and possible errors by sending you an e-mail message. Later, you can also click on the menu item "Sent Invitations" to get more information about the status of the sent invitations.
